levels.name: AI-Free/AI-Resistant
levels.description: Problems designed to be completed without AI

levels.description: AI used for specific tasks (brainstorming, planning, etc.)

levels.name: AI-Enhanced
levels.description: AI integrated throughout with human oversight

levels.name: AI-Empowered
levels.description: Using AI to create innovative solutions

zeroToInfinity.description: A continuum of approaches to student use of AI in learning activities
